translations: n．毁灭，歼灭：彻底消灭或摧毁某物或某人的过程。

phrs.translation: 正电子湮没；阳电子湮没

sentences.sentence: It will look for evidence of dark matter "annihilations" in space.
sentences.translation: 它将寻找暗物质在太空“湮灭”的证据。

sentences.sentence: The formation of Amber is the result of the melting of the tree kingdom in the many nuclear annihilations upon earth.
sentences.translation: 琥珀的形成，是树木王国在地球上的许多次核毁灭中瞬间融化的结果。

sentences.sentence: These annihilations are thought to occur when two WIMPs collide, generating gamma-rays which can be picked up by detectors such as those on board Fermi.
sentences.translation: 据称，在两个弱作用大质量粒子碰撞时会发生湮灭，并且放出伽马射线，类似费尔米卫星的探测器能够捕捉到这种信号。
